item.title: Tears of joy as freed Thai hostages arrive home
item.description: "I don't know how to put it into words," says one of the hostages released from Gaza last month.

item.title: First president of Namibia dies aged 95
item.description: President Nangolo Mbumba announces the death of the Sam Nujoma who led Namibia for 15 years.

item.title: Tsunami alerts cancelled after Caribbean earthquake
item.description: Warnings had been issued for a number of countries including Cuba, Puerto Rico and the Cayman Islands.

item.title: Sam Nujoma: The revolutionary leader who liberated Namibia
item.description: The anti-apartheid leader is celebrated for dedicating his life to the struggle for Namibia's independence.

item.title: Harry and Meghan cheer from stands at Invictus Games in Canada
item.description: The couple watched from the stands, cheering and clapping for the UK's team.
